body_html: Have you tried official docker file (docker/pytorch/Dockerfile)? I've just rebuilt an image with it, it starts with nvidia/cuda:9.0-cudnn7-devel-ubuntu16.04 image, the same you are using, has cudnn 7.1.4, and it works for me. The fact that you also have issues with lua torch points to the problems with your environment rather than cuda libraries.
